description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the ABB IRBT 4004 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for ABB IRBT 4004 trackmotion.
Joint limits and max joint velocities to be documented.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
